alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:39AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northern Madison and northeastern Limestone Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 238 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harvest, or 7 miles west of Meridianville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Gurley, Alabama A And M University, Harvest, New Market and University Of Alabama In Huntsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
